name: Not My Fault (pandamonium77, Mariia Kharitonova, CommanderShizzle, 1nvadersmustdie, ojuliaspinola)
name_original: Not My Fault (pandamonium77, Mariia Kharitonova, CommanderShizzle, 1nvadersmustdie, ojuliaspinola)
description:
A point-and-click adventure game where you play as someone going through an endless cycle as they deal with the trauma of their past. 

Will they be able to overcome it?

This game was created by Farooq Dehlvi, Mariia Kharitonova,  Ben Knight, Nir Perlman, Parham Sorooshian & Julia Spinola.
